name: jdhenry105
text: Has someone ever played this and sent it to Onstad?

name: closefriend
text: I transcribed it into Finale once and made a MIDI of it. I'll see if I can dig it up. It certainly sounds ragtime-y.

name: badganjil
text: Pure Achewood devotion earns a chubby for you.

name: straw
text:
I played it

It was 1/12 of an exercise

Special note: exercises aren't keen on being very musical

name: yourarbiter
text: It's the intro to "Elite Syncopations" by Scott Joplin.

name: jdhenry105
text:
Nice. I'm glad someone finally provided that info. You can hear it here:

http://www.mp3.com/albums/109073/summary.html

name: heccibiggs
text:
Shit, this would make me dance like there's an ass in my pants.

(Can I just make the point now that as a Brit, I am so envious that Americans get to use the word "ass". It's such a good word, "arse" just always sounds stupid, unless ssaid by an Irish person, and they're allowed to as "ass" as well.)

name: joeynarcotic
text:
I much prefer 'arse'. It's all in the way you say it. Us Kiwis say it great. "It's fucking arse, mate."

My problems is that in my accent 'dance' rhymes with 'arse' but not with 'pants'. To make it rhyme I'd have to sing "Everybody dance like there's arse in your parnts!"

name: gormster
text: To be fair, with a kiwi accent, most words rhyme.

name: joeynarcotic
text: For example, "nostril" rhymes with "fart".

name: dskim
text: Shit, I performed this at Stony Brook University just a few months ago for the annual piano project.  I didn't know people were looking for it.  Wish I had known before.

name: fancyrat
text: Just listened to the song and burst out singing "Ass In Your Pants". It matches perfectly; I can only assume Onstad was listening to it at the time he wrote this.

name: spinynorman
text:
I'd like to point out that in 1985 Eddie Murphy had a semi-legitimate pop hit called "Booty in your Butt" on the album "Party All the Time."

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Party_All_the_Time

Coincidence?

name: belgand
text: Nothing about "Party All the Time" qualifies as even semi-legitimate.

name: magb
text: That's the sweetest backflip I ever saw.

name: nurdbot
text: That sound effect from the Six Million Dollar Man play in your head too when you saw it?

name: hellofyellin
text: The backflip is necessary for a good recording.  It is basic.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: true. the jackson five, ray charles, justin timberlake and that guy from led zepplin all got their start as acrobats in small timey circuses.

name: jlynes
text: One of these things is not like the others.[

name: tasteful
text: jt is tops

name: gouldgonewild
text:
what if i say i'm not just another one of your plays?
You're the pretender.

Man, all of my comments are song lyrics. That is just all I can think of, okay.

name: hateandwar
text: You didn't actually think of anything then.

name: troy_convers
text: I'm beginning to think that Ray is named after Mr. Charles. Art Imitating life...

name: centipede_damascus
text: Now that there is a catchy tune.

name: mr_wilson
text: Honestly, are these rating buttons broken. How is the comic with the cat telling everyone to dance like there's ass in their pants and then backflipping to the piano to rock it, not a straight up 5? I ask you this.

name: jamers
text: I have no idea. This is a classic line, and is well deserving of a 5.

name: chaobell
text: It has my 5 for the backflip alone.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I brought that t-shirt and gave it to my little sister who actually does dance like there's an ass in her pants

name: belgand
text: Is this her ass or the ass of another person simultaneously inside of her pants? It makes a crucial difference.

name: cicadalek
text: I love the backflip, not only as a sweet move, but because Ray does it even though he's only recording sound. Now there's dedication .

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: looks like Pat got a hold of this page and did not approve of what we all said and called us all spammers.

name: tombsgrave
text:
One word:

Jawesome.

name: epicurus
text: I love the backflip. Also, none of those comments were spam at all.

name: shoinan
text: Ever since I saw this strip I always dance like there is ASS in my pants. When people see me dance this way they too dance like there is ASS in their pants and soon everybody is indeed dancing like there is ASS in their pants, ASS in their pants, ASS in their pants.

name: 1000hz
text: Sorry Ray, we're gonna have to record that one again. The mic made a big thud when you dropped it.

name: atom
text: Knowing what the next strip is makes this one unbearably funny

name: gussiejives
text:
This was the very first Achewood strip I laid eyes on... one of the best ways to begin ever!

Damn Ray's athletic to do a backflip over a piano.

name: cheeks_jd
text: Another of the rare ones that actually made me laugh out loud.

name: songbirdspectre
text: ASS IN YOUR PANTS.

name: songbirdspectre
text: ah wtf. *frowns* i've fucked up again.

name: chomopomomofo
text: Hey, shh.  No judgements.  We're all friends here.

name: tttt
text: this arc has produced the goods so many times over

name: norrin
text: To this day, "dance like there's ass in your pants" is a permanent part of my vocabulary.

name: vern
text: Hilarious, I never realized this strip ran on my birthday. "Dance like there's ass in your pants" has always been a favorite phrase of mine since I saw this.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
your avi rocks my screen. bavoom.

rad.

name: laserblade
text: He dances so FURIOUSLY in the second panel.

name: wurlitzergirl
text:
I love it: its all dancing like there's ass in your pants and then... ragtime piano.
Shit. I've always wanted to do something like that.

name: wfl
text: I imagine that that last "ass in your pants" is sung in falsetto, not entirely unlike Trent Reznor's studio falsetto (but not the whiny fasletto; more like, Closer in falsetto).  Of course, Ray would always be able to pull it off live, unlike Trent (don't think I've ever heard the man do a proper falsetto live).

name: fmercury
text: I like to him imagine backflipping and then busting out some Chopin, all contemplative and such.

name: jhunter
text: You know a strip is gold when the alt text is a straight-up quotation

name: mikeronomicon
text: I forgot about this strip. I love ass in the pants!

name: wallabeechamp
text: I dance like I have legs in my pants. Thanks to Ray, I can see where I was going wrong!

name: ninjamike
text: I love how being great at piano necessarily equates to being able to do a sweet back tuck. Maybe instead of gymnastics lessons I should just take piano classes and let things flow naturally :D

name: swordsower
text: humph.  electronic keyboard gives no such dexterity bonuses.  I now understand my error; thank you Ray.

name: hendetta
text: Don' swee' talk ma nah!
